column2: All Catholic Christians and heresies will be merged with the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith\n
The Ecumenical Patriarch will become the new §YPatriarch Supreme§! and thus the religion head for all Chalcedonian Christianity\n
The §YPatriarchate of Constantinople§! no longer exists, and cannot be created\n
The §YPatriarchate of Constantinople§! is part of the §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§!\n
All Miaphysites and their heresies will be merged into the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith\n
All Orthodox Christians and heresies will be merged with the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith\n
Nestorianism and its heresies will be merged into the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith\n
§Y[This.GetName]§! is held by a §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! ruler and not at war\n
The Pope will become the new §YPatriarch Supreme§! and the religion head for all Chalcedonian Christianity\n
The §YPapacy of Rome§! no longer exists, and cannot be created\n
The §YPapacy of Rome§! is part of the §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§!\n
At least two other Pentarchs have §YGreek Rites§!\n
At least two other Pentarchs have §YLatin Rites§!\n
